task.title: Dealing with Engine Fires
task.shortdesc: Formerly a great many fires started in the carburetor.

context.p: At present, because of the many improvements in carburetion, few engine fires start in this manner. The most common cause today is the mechanical failure of some part.

step.cmd: Cut off gas to the engine.

result.p: This quickly empties the carburetor and exhausts the fuel that is burning. In most cases no other action need be taken.
